thread.title: Many masks of Mann at High Street
thread.title_full: Many masks of Mann at High Street

author: news@courierpublicationsllc.com (Staff)
title: Many masks of Mann at High Street
text:
Many masks of Mann at High Street Oct 15, 2015 The masks of Beverly Mann are featured inside Belfast’s High Street Studio & Gallery this month, as well as in action on the streets during the city’s Fourth Friday Art Walk. 
Belfast — High Street Studio & Gallery, 149 High St., shows the work of Susan Tobey White and, through the end of October, intriguing masks created by Beverly Mann. The gallery will be open during the 5:30 to 8 p.m. Fourth Friday Art Walk Oct. 23, during which Mann will perform mask theater on the streets. 
Mann is an actor, mask theater/mask maker, educator and performing artist. She has toured throughout the United States and in Europe, Africa, Asia, South America and Canada, performing her distinctive blend of mask, movement and theater. 
During October, the gallery is open Thursdays and Fridays from 10 a.m. to 5 p.m.; Saturdays from 10 a.m. to 4 p.m.; and by chance or appointment Sundays through Wednesdays. For more information, visit susantobeywhite.com . 
Courier Publications’ A&E Editor Dagney C. Ernest can be reached at (207) 594-4401, ext. 115; or dernest@courierpublicationsllc.com.
